song.title: This is Our God (Freely You Gave)
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .D F#m7, Bm G
[1] .D F#m Your grace is enough . Bm More than I need . G D At Your Word I will believe || . D/F# F#m I wait for You . Bm Draw near again . G A Let Your Spirit make me new
[C] . D/F# G I will fall at Your feet . Em7 A/C# I will fall at Your feet . D/F# G (F#m7) And I will worship You here
---
[2] .D F#m Your presence in me . Bm Jesus light the way . G D By the power of Your word || . F#m I am restored . Bm I am redeemed . G A By Your Spirit I am free
[INSTRUMENTAL] .D A Em Bm G A
[B] . D Freely You gave it all for us . A Surrendered Your life upon that cross || . Em7 Great is the love . Bm Poured out for all . G A This is our God || . D Lifted on high from death to life . A Forever our God is glorified || . Em7 Servant and King . Bm Rescued the world . G This is our God
